data.subject: Seasons In The Sun
data.lyric:
Adieu, Emile, my trusted friend
 We've known each other since we were nine or ten
 Together we climb

data.subject: Hobo`s Lullaby
data.lyric:
Go to sleep, you weary hobo Watch the towns go drifting by
 Can't you hear the rails a singin' That'

data.subject: Coal Tattoo
data.lyric:
Travelin' down that coal town road Listenin' to my rubber tires whine
 Goodbye to Buckeye and white

data.subject: The Patriot Game
data.lyric:
Billy Behen
 Come all you young rebels and list while we sing
 For the love of one's country is a te

data.subject: Sloop John B (윤형주 & 김세환 그리운 고향)
data.lyric:
We come on the sloop John be, my grandfather and me Around Nassau town we did roam
 Drinkin' all nig
